long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension in support of the MSNBC & sponsors boycott after a pattern of under-representation by the news organization regarding Andrew Yang's campaign.

MSNBC and sponsor websites will be blocked and the user redirected to a page listing ways the user can help.

THIS EXTENSION IS NOT IN ANY WAY AFFILIATED WITH ANDREW YANG OR HIS CAMPAIGN.

If you're a sponsor who has pulled their support of MSNBC, thank you and contact @yangcurious on twitter to be removed from the list :)
